alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Genesee; Northern Erie; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 3:47AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY LAKE EFFECT SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF CHAUTAUQUA... CATTARAUGUS...SOUTHERN ERIE...WYOMING...GENESEE...AND NORTHERN ERIE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy lake effect snow is beginning to move north toward the Buffalo Metro, now already reaching portions of Southtowns. This band will continue moving north, arriving over Lackawanna, South Buffalo and West Seneca after 5 AM. Expect snowfall rates over one inch per hour and localized visibility less than one-half mile at times as the band lifts across the area early this morning. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Buffalo, West Seneca, Lackawanna, Dunkirk, Fredonia, Hamburg, East Aurora, Darien Lakes State Park, Evans, Elma, Boston, Eden, Marilla, Springville, Bennington, Colden, Orchard Park, Gowanda, Silver Creek, and Alden. Be prepared for difficult winter travel conditions. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 55 and 59 and Route 219. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
